content.title: Breastfeeding Support
content.statement: Breastfeeding Support is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Obstetrics-Gynecology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Breastfeeding Support helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Breastfeeding Support include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Breastfeeding Support.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
